mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran ( id, activityId, createBy, createTime, expectedDate, money, stage, name, contactsId, customerId, owner, source, type, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime )values ( #{id}, #{activityId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{expectedDate}, #{money}, #{stage}, #{name}, #{contactsId}, #{customerId}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{type}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
